MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL68 and LL70 postcode areas of Dulas and Amlwch affecting properties in Nebo, Llaneilian and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:25 am. Our engineers are on their way to the area to investigate and repair the fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 11:15 am. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:15 am on 19th November, 2020.
